parameters.name: About
parameters.description: View release history for this workbook

content.json:
### Email Event Analysis Workbook, version 0.2

author: Brian Delaney, MSFT

Release Notes:

1.0 - Oct 18, 2021
- Initial Release

parameters.name: EmailDirection
parameters.query:
EmailEvents
| summarize Count=count() by EmailDirection
| sort by Count desc
| project EmailDirection, Label=strcat(EmailDirection, ' - ', Count, ' messages')

parameters.name: RecipientDomain
parameters.query:
EmailEvents
| where isempty("{Sender}") or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender}"
| where isempty("{Recipient}") or RecipientEmailAddress =~ "{Recipient}"
| extend RecipientDomain = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, "@", 1)[0])
| summarize Messages=count() by RecipientDomain
| sort by Messages desc
| project RecipientDomain, strcat(RecipientDomain, ' - ', Messages, ' messages')

parameters.name: SenderDomain
parameters.query:
EmailEvents
| where isempty("{Sender}") or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender}"
| where isempty("{Recipient}") or RecipientEmailAddress =~ "{Recipient}"
//| extend RecipientDomain = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, "@", 1)[0])
| summarize Messages=count() by SenderMailFromDomain
| sort by Messages desc
| project SenderMailFromDomain, strcat(SenderMailFromDomain, ' - ', Messages, ' messages')

parameters.name: MinimumAttachmentCount
parameters.description: Only include messages that have at least this many attachments

parameters.name: MinimumURLCount
parameters.description: Only include messages that have at least these many embedded URLs

content.query:
EmailEvents
| where isempty("{Sender}") or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender}"
| where isempty("{Recipient}") or RecipientEmailAddress =~ "{Recipient}"
| where EmailDirection in ({EmailDirection})
| where AttachmentCount >= {MinimumAttachmentCount} and UrlCount >= {MinimumURLCount}
| extend RecipientDomain = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, "@", 1)[0])
| where "*" in ({RecipientDomain}) or RecipientDomain in ({RecipientDomain})
| where "*" in ({SenderDomain}) or SenderMailFromDomain in ({SenderDomain})
| where isempty("{Subject}") or Subject contains "{Subject}"
| summarize Count=count() by EmailDirection
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Email Direction

content.query:
EmailEvents
| where isempty("{Sender}") or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender}"
| where isempty("{Recipient}") or RecipientEmailAddress =~ "{Recipient}"
| where EmailDirection in ({EmailDirection})
| where AttachmentCount >= {MinimumAttachmentCount} and UrlCount >= {MinimumURLCount}
| where "{Direction}" == "All" or EmailDirection == "{Direction}"
| extend RecipientDomain = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, "@", 1)[0])
| where "*" in ({RecipientDomain}) or RecipientDomain in ({RecipientDomain})
| where "*" in ({SenderDomain}) or SenderMailFromDomain in ({SenderDomain})
| where isempty("{Subject}") or Subject contains "{Subject}"
| summarize Count=count() by DeliveryAction
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Delivery Action

content.query:
EmailEvents
| where isempty("{Sender}") or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender}"
| where isempty("{Recipient}") or RecipientEmailAddress =~ "{Recipient}"
| where EmailDirection in ({EmailDirection})
| where AttachmentCount >= {MinimumAttachmentCount} and UrlCount >= {MinimumURLCount}
| where "{Direction}" == "All" or EmailDirection == "{Direction}"
| where "{DeliveryAction}" == "All" or DeliveryAction == "{DeliveryAction}"
| extend RecipientDomain = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, "@", 1)[0])
| where "*" in ({RecipientDomain}) or RecipientDomain in ({RecipientDomain})
| where "*" in ({SenderDomain}) or SenderMailFromDomain in ({SenderDomain})
| where isempty("{Subject}") or Subject contains "{Subject}"
| summarize Count=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), EmailDirection
content.title: Email Timeline

content.query:
EmailEvents
| where EmailDirection in ({EmailDirection})
| where AttachmentCount >= {MinimumAttachmentCount} and UrlCount >= {MinimumURLCount}
| where "{Direction}" == "All" or EmailDirection == "{Direction}"
| where isempty("{Sender}") or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender}"
| where isempty("{Recipient}") or RecipientEmailAddress =~ "{Recipient}"
| where "{Direction}" == "All" or EmailDirection == "{Direction}"
| where "{DeliveryAction}" == "All" or DeliveryAction == "{DeliveryAction}"
| extend RecipientDomain = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, "@", 1)[0])
| where "*" in ({RecipientDomain}) or RecipientDomain in ({RecipientDomain})
| where "*" in ({SenderDomain}) or SenderMailFromDomain in ({SenderDomain})
| where isempty("{Subject}") or Subject contains "{Subject}"
| summarize DistinctMessages=dcount(InternetMessageId), DistinctRecipients=dcount(RecipientEmailAddress), DistinctRecipientDomains=dcount(RecipientDomain), NetworkMessageIds=make_set(NetworkMessageId) by SenderMailFromAddress
| sort by DistinctMessages desc
content.title: Top Senders

content.query:
EmailEvents
| where EmailDirection in ({EmailDirection})
| where AttachmentCount >= {MinimumAttachmentCount} and UrlCount >= {MinimumURLCount}
| where "{Direction}" == "All" or EmailDirection == "{Direction}"
| where isempty("{Sender}") or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender}"
| where "{Sender2}" == "All" or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender2}"
| where isempty("{Recipient}") or RecipientEmailAddress =~ "{Recipient}"
| where "{Direction}" == "All" or EmailDirection == "{Direction}"
| where "{DeliveryAction}" == "All" or DeliveryAction == "{DeliveryAction}"
| extend RecipientDomain = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, "@", 1)[0])
| where "*" in ({RecipientDomain}) or RecipientDomain in ({RecipientDomain})
| where "*" in ({SenderDomain}) or SenderMailFromDomain in ({SenderDomain})
| where isempty("{Subject}") or Subject contains "{Subject}"
| summarize DistinctMessages=dcount(InternetMessageId), DistinctSenders=dcount(SenderMailFromAddress), NetworkMessageIds=make_set(NetworkMessageId) by RecipientEmailAddress
| sort by DistinctMessages
content.title: Top Recipients

content.query:
EmailEvents
| where EmailDirection in ({EmailDirection})
| where AttachmentCount >= {MinimumAttachmentCount} and UrlCount >= {MinimumURLCount}
| where "{Direction}" == "All" or EmailDirection == "{Direction}"
| where isempty("{Sender}") or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender}"
| where "{Sender2}" == "All" or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender2}"
| where isempty("{Recipient}") or RecipientEmailAddress =~ "{Recipient}"
| where "{Direction}" == "All" or EmailDirection == "{Direction}"
| where "{DeliveryAction}" == "All" or DeliveryAction == "{DeliveryAction}"
| extend RecipientDomain = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, "@", 1)[0])
| where "*" in ({RecipientDomain}) or RecipientDomain in ({RecipientDomain})
| where "*" in ({SenderDomain}) or SenderMailFromDomain in ({SenderDomain})
| where isempty("{Subject}") or Subject contains "{Subject}"
| summarize DistinctMessages=dcount(InternetMessageId), DistinctSenders=dcount(SenderMailFromAddress), NetworkMessageIds=make_set(NetworkMessageId) by RecipientDomain
| sort by DistinctMessages desc
content.title: Top Recipient Domains

content.query:
let ids = array_concat(dynamic({NetworkMessageIdsSender}),dynamic({NetworkMessageIdsRecipient}),dynamic({NetworkMessageIdsDomain}));
EmailEvents
| where NetworkMessageId in (ids) or array_length(ids) == 0
| where EmailDirection in ({EmailDirection})
| where AttachmentCount >= {MinimumAttachmentCount} and UrlCount >= {MinimumURLCount}
| where "{Direction}" == "All" or EmailDirection == "{Direction}"
| where isempty("{Sender}") or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender}"
| where "{Sender2}" == "All" or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender2}"
| where isempty("{Recipient}") or RecipientEmailAddress =~ "{Recipient}"
| where "{Direction}" == "All" or EmailDirection == "{Direction}"
| where "{DeliveryAction}" == "All" or DeliveryAction == "{DeliveryAction}"
| extend RecipientDomain = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, "@", 1)[0])
| where "*" in ({RecipientDomain}) or RecipientDomain in ({RecipientDomain})
| where "*" in ({SenderDomain}) or SenderMailFromDomain in ({SenderDomain})
| where isempty("{Subject}") or Subject contains "{Subject}"
| project TimeGenerated, SenderMailFromAddress, RecipientEmailAddress, Subject, EmailDirection, EmailLanguage, DeliveryAction, ConfidenceLevel, AttachmentCount, UrlCount, NetworkMessageId
content.title: Message Details

content.query:
EmailAttachmentInfo
| where NetworkMessageId == "{NetworkMessageId}"
| project FileName, FileType, SHA256, ThreatTypes, ThreatNames, DetectionMethods
content.title: Attached Files
content.noDataMessage: Either no message was selected or no attachments were present

content.query:
EmailUrlInfo
| where NetworkMessageId == "{NetworkMessageId}"
| project Url, UrlDomain
content.title: Embedded URLs
content.noDataMessage: Either no message was selected or no URLs were present

content.query:
EmailEvents
| where EmailDirection in ({EmailDirection})
| where AttachmentCount >= {MinimumAttachmentCount} and UrlCount >= {MinimumURLCount}
| where isempty("{Sender}") or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender}"
| where isempty("{Recipient}") or RecipientEmailAddress =~ "{Recipient}"
| extend RecipientDomain = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, "@", 1)[0])
| where "*" in ({RecipientDomain}) or RecipientDomain in ({RecipientDomain})
| where "*" in ({SenderDomain}) or SenderMailFromDomain in ({SenderDomain})
| where isempty("{Subject}") or Subject contains "{Subject}"
| summarize TotalAttachments=sum(AttachmentCount), DistinctRecipients=dcount(RecipientEmailAddress), DistinctRecipientDomains=dcount(RecipientDomain), NetworkMessageIds=make_set(NetworkMessageId) by SenderMailFromAddress
| where TotalAttachments > 0
| sort by TotalAttachments desc
content.title: Top Attachment Senders

content.query:
EmailEvents
| where EmailDirection in ({EmailDirection})
| where AttachmentCount >= {MinimumAttachmentCount} and UrlCount >= {MinimumURLCount}
| where isempty("{Sender}") or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender}"
| where "{Sender2}" == "All" or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender2}"
| where isempty("{Recipient}") or RecipientEmailAddress =~ "{Recipient}"
| extend RecipientDomain = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, "@", 1)[0])
| where "*" in ({RecipientDomain}) or RecipientDomain in ({RecipientDomain})
| where "*" in ({SenderDomain}) or SenderMailFromDomain in ({SenderDomain})
| where isempty("{Subject}") or Subject contains "{Subject}"
| summarize TotalAttachments=sum(AttachmentCount), DistinctSenders=dcount(SenderMailFromAddress), NetworkMessageIds=make_set(NetworkMessageId) by RecipientEmailAddress
| where TotalAttachments > 0
| sort by TotalAttachments desc
content.title: Top Attachment Recipients

content.query:
EmailEvents
| where EmailDirection in ({EmailDirection})
| where AttachmentCount >= {MinimumAttachmentCount} and UrlCount >= {MinimumURLCount}
| where isempty("{Sender}") or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender}"
| where "{Sender2}" == "All" or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender2}"
| where isempty("{Recipient}") or RecipientEmailAddress =~ "{Recipient}"
| extend RecipientDomain = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, "@", 1)[0])
| where "*" in ({RecipientDomain}) or RecipientDomain in ({RecipientDomain})
| where "*" in ({SenderDomain}) or SenderMailFromDomain in ({SenderDomain})
| where isempty("{Subject}") or Subject contains "{Subject}"
| summarize TotalAttachments=sum(AttachmentCount), DistinctSenders=dcount(SenderMailFromAddress), NetworkMessageIds=make_set(NetworkMessageId) by RecipientDomain
| where TotalAttachments > 0
| sort by TotalAttachments desc
content.title: Top Attachment Recipient Domains

parameters.name: AttachmentType
parameters.query:
EmailAttachmentInfo
| summarize AttachmentCount=count() by FileType
| sort by AttachmentCount desc
| project FileType, strcat(FileType, ' - ', AttachmentCount, ' attachments')

content.query:
let ids = array_concat(dynamic({NetworkMessageIdsSender}),dynamic({NetworkMessageIdsRecipient}),dynamic({NetworkMessageIdsDomain}));
EmailAttachmentInfo
| where NetworkMessageId in (ids) or array_length(ids) == 0
| where FileName contains "{AttachmentName}"
| where "*" in ({AttachmentType}) or FileType in ({AttachmentType})
| summarize UniqueEmailsWithThisAttachment=dcount(NetworkMessageId), NetworkMessageIdWithFile=make_set(NetworkMessageId) by FileName, FileType, SHA256

let ids = dynamic({NetworkMessageIdWithFile});
EmailAttachmentInfo
| where NetworkMessageId in (ids)
| distinct NetworkMessageId
| join kind=leftouter (EmailEvents) on NetworkMessageId
| extend RecipientDomain = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, "@", 1)[0])
| project TimeGenerated, SenderMailFromAddress, RecipientEmailAddress, Subject, EmailDirection, EmailLanguage, DeliveryAction, ConfidenceLevel, AttachmentCount, UrlCount, NetworkMessageId
content.title: Message Details

content.query:
EmailEvents
| where EmailDirection in ({EmailDirection})
| where AttachmentCount >= {MinimumAttachmentCount} and UrlCount >= {MinimumURLCount}
| where isempty("{Sender}") or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender}"
| where isempty("{Recipient}") or RecipientEmailAddress =~ "{Recipient}"
| extend RecipientDomain = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, "@", 1)[0])
| where "*" in ({RecipientDomain}) or RecipientDomain in ({RecipientDomain})
| where "*" in ({SenderDomain}) or SenderMailFromDomain in ({SenderDomain})
| where isempty("{Subject}") or Subject contains "{Subject}"
| summarize TotalUrls=sum(UrlCount), DistinctRecipients=dcount(RecipientEmailAddress), DistinctRecipientDomains=dcount(RecipientDomain), NetworkMessageIds=make_set(NetworkMessageId) by SenderMailFromAddress
| where TotalUrls > 0
| sort by TotalUrls desc
content.title: Top Url Senders

content.query:
EmailEvents
| where EmailDirection in ({EmailDirection})
| where AttachmentCount >= {MinimumAttachmentCount} and UrlCount >= {MinimumURLCount}
| where isempty("{Sender}") or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender}"
| where "{Sender2}" == "All" or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender2}"
| where isempty("{Recipient}") or RecipientEmailAddress =~ "{Recipient}"
| extend RecipientDomain = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, "@", 1)[0])
| where "*" in ({RecipientDomain}) or RecipientDomain in ({RecipientDomain})
| where "*" in ({SenderDomain}) or SenderMailFromDomain in ({SenderDomain})
| where isempty("{Subject}") or Subject contains "{Subject}"
| summarize TotalUrls=sum(UrlCount), DistinctSenders=dcount(SenderMailFromAddress), NetworkMessageIds=make_set(NetworkMessageId) by RecipientEmailAddress
| where TotalUrls > 0
| sort by TotalUrls desc
content.title: Top Url Recipients

content.query:
EmailEvents
| where EmailDirection in ({EmailDirection})
| where AttachmentCount >= {MinimumAttachmentCount} and UrlCount >= {MinimumURLCount}
| where isempty("{Sender}") or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender}"
| where "{Sender2}" == "All" or SenderMailFromAddress =~ "{Sender2}"
| where isempty("{Recipient}") or RecipientEmailAddress =~ "{Recipient}"
| extend RecipientDomain = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, "@", 1)[0])
| where "*" in ({RecipientDomain}) or RecipientDomain in ({RecipientDomain})
| where "*" in ({SenderDomain}) or SenderMailFromDomain in ({SenderDomain})
| where isempty("{Subject}") or Subject contains "{Subject}"
| summarize TotalUrls=sum(UrlCount), DistinctSenders=dcount(SenderMailFromAddress), NetworkMessageIds=make_set(NetworkMessageId) by RecipientDomain
| where TotalUrls > 0
| sort by TotalUrls desc
content.title: Top Url Recipient Domains

parameters.name: UrlDomain
parameters.query:
EmailUrlInfo
| summarize UrlCount=count() by UrlDomain
| sort by UrlCount desc
| project UrlDomain, strcat(UrlDomain, ' - ', UrlCount, ' URLs')

content.query:
let ids = array_concat(dynamic({NetworkMessageIdsSender}),dynamic({NetworkMessageIdsRecipient}),dynamic({NetworkMessageIdsDomain}));
EmailUrlInfo
| where NetworkMessageId in (ids) or array_length(ids) == 0
| where Url contains "{Url}"
| where "*" in ({UrlDomain}) or UrlDomain in ({UrlDomain})
| summarize UniqueMessagesWithUrl=dcount(NetworkMessageId), NetworkMessageIdWithUrl=make_set(NetworkMessageId) by Url, UrlDomain

let ids = dynamic({NetworkMessageIdWithUrl});
EmailUrlInfo
| where NetworkMessageId in (ids)
| distinct NetworkMessageId
| join kind=leftouter (EmailEvents) on NetworkMessageId
| extend RecipientDomain = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, "@", 1)[0])
| project TimeGenerated, SenderMailFromAddress, RecipientEmailAddress, Subject, EmailDirection, EmailLanguage, DeliveryAction, ConfidenceLevel, AttachmentCount, UrlCount, NetworkMessageId
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Message Details

fromTemplateId: Community-Workbooks/Microsoft Sentinel - Workbooks/Microsoft Defender for Office 365
